title: Powell on attack on American system - comparison

content.question: Those who shared Powell’s perspective most likely opposed which of the following developments in the United States?

choices.label: The rise of the military‑industrial complex during the 1950s and the 1960s
An increase in the standard of living in the decades following the Second World War
Laws limiting the power of labor unions in the 1920s
The creation of social welfare and regulatory agencies under the New Deal and Great Society

content.answer: The creation of social welfare and regulatory agencies under the New Deal and Great Society

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
